thread.title_full: DreamWorks Animation Announces Conference Call And Webcast For Third Quarter 2015 Results - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: DreamWorks Animation Announces Conference Call And Webcast For Third Quarter 2015 Results
text:
DreamWorks Animation SKG, Inc.
GLENDALE, Calif. , Oct. 12, DreamWorks Animation SKG, Inc. (Nasdaq: DWA) will host a conference call and webcast to discuss its 2015 third quarter results on Thursday, November 5, 2015 at 1:30pm (PT) / 4:30pm (ET). Investors can access the call by dialing (800) 230-1096 in the U.S. and (612) 332-0107 internationally and identifying "DreamWorks Animation Quarterly Earnings Call" to the operator. The call will also be available via live webcast at ir.dreamworksanimation.com .
A replay of the conference call will be available from 3:45pm (PT) Thursday, November 5, 2015 through 11:59pm (PT) Thursday, November 19, 2015 . To access the replay, dial (800) 475-6701 in the U.S. and (320) 365-3844 internationally and enter 371009 as the conference ID number. An archived copy of the webcast will also be available on the Company's website at ir.dreamworksanimation.com.
About DreamWorks Animation
DreamWorks Animation creates high-quality entertainment, including CG animated feature films, television specials and series and live entertainment properties, meant for audiences around the world. The Company has world-class creative talent, a strong and experienced management team and advanced filmmaking technology and techniques. All of DreamWorks Animation's feature films are produced in 3D. The Company has theatrically released a total of 31 animated feature films, including the franchise properties of Shrek , Madagascar , Kung Fu Panda , How to Train Your Dragon , Puss In Boots and The Croods .
